definition: can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])

sentences.english: Cut through the windpipe the jugular the epiglottis the hyoid the tongue.
sentences.chinese: 割开她的气管，颈静脉，会厌软骨，舌骨和舌头。

sentences.english: Hemorrhages of the epiglottis and larynx appear to vary with the conditions under which the disease is observed.
sentences.chinese: 会厌和喉头的出血因观察疾病时的条件不同而异。

sentences.english: Objective To sum up the clinical experience for the diagnosis and treatment of acute epiglottitis.
sentences.chinese: 目的总结急性会厌炎的诊断和治疗经验，提高疗效。

sentences.english: Acute epiglottitis is usually caused by a bacterial infection.
sentences.chinese: 急性会厌炎，一般多因感染所造成。

sentences.english: That closure is what causes the hiccup sound.
sentences.chinese: 会厌就是打嗝声音发出的地方。

sentences.english: Demonstrate management of patients with upper airway infection suspected of having epiglottitis .
sentences.chinese: 展现对于疑似有会厌炎之上呼吸道感染患者的处方式。

sentences.english: Methods 180 cases clinical data of acute epiglottitis are summarized and analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 方法对180例急性会厌炎临床资料进行总结和分析。

sentences.english: The incidence of epiglottitis has decreased since the introduction of the HIB (Haemophilus influenzae B) vaccine.
sentences.chinese: 自从引入流感嗜血菌疫苗后，会厌炎发病率明显降低。

sentences.english: Conclusion This therapy with ESED is effective on chronic hypertrophic laryngitis.
sentences.chinese: 结论会厌逐瘀汤加味治疗慢性肥厚性喉炎有确切疗效。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the treatment of acute epiglottitis and care.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨急性会厌炎的诊治和护理。

definition: esophagus/the proper way to eat/food transportation route
Eustachian tube (linking pharynx 咽 to tympanic cavity 鼓室 of middle ear)/auditory tube
